name: Skins & Mods for Minecraft PE
description:
More than 1000 add ons, skins, mods, maps, seeds and textures for Minecraft Pocket Edition with easy installation process and regular updates!

Download and install addons for Minecraft MCPE in one touch or use the manual installation instructions.

Only the best and most popular add-ons for Minecraft PE

SKINS
Skins for Minecraft PE will turn your character into a famous superhero, celebrity or movie hero! A huge number of shapes are available for you.

MAPS
Maps are a great opportunity to explore many new places! Survive on the Skyblock map for Minecraft, fight with monsters on the Horror map or fall on Dropper maps for Minecraft PE.

MODS
Latest mods for MCPE diversify the game and add to it what you were so lacking! Use in Minecraft a toolbox mod to make your life easer or tnt mods to blow everything. There are many famous mods: pixelmon mod, dragons, dinosaurs, unicorns etc.

TEXTURES
This content makes the world in Minecraft even brighter and more colorful! Our collection of textures will help to show your creativity to the maximum.

ADD ONS
Want to add lucky block mod to Minecraft? Nothing is easier! Just a couple of taps and here their are.

KEY FEATURES
• All Add-Ons fully tested
• Compilation of the best and unique Add-Ons available.
• Will be updated constantly with more items.

DISCLAIMER: This is not official Minecraft product. Not approved by or associated with Mojang Ab.
